title: Vegetarian Korma Recipe
description: This creamy vegetable korma recipe is packed with potatoes, bell peppers, carrots, peas, cilantro, and spices for a flavorsome vegetarian curry.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Global Cuisines Asian Indian Vegetarian Korma 4.6 (1,695) 1,153 Reviews 205 Photos This vegetable korma recipe is an easy vegetarian curry. It's rich, creamy, mildly spiced, and extremely flavorful. Serve with naan and rice. Submitted by YAKUTA Updated on October 4, 2023 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 205 205 205 205 Prep Time: 25 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 55 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 ½ tablespoons vegetable oil 1 small onion, diced 4 cloves garlic, minced 1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger root 4 carrots, cubed 2 potatoes, cubed 1 (4 ounce) can tomato sauce 3 tablespoons ground unsalted cashews 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and sliced 1 ½ tablespoons curry powder 2 teaspoons salt 1 cup heavy cream 1 cup frozen green peas ½ green bell pepper, chopped ½ red bell pepper, chopped 1 bunch fresh cilantro for garnish Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion; cook and stir until tender, about 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir in carrots, potatoes, tomato sauce, cashews, and jalapeño. Season with curry powder and salt; cook and stir until potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir in cream, peas, green bell pepper, and red bell pepper; reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro to serve. Allrecipes Magazine I Made It Print 2,749 home cooks made it! Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Vegetarian Korma 01 of 205 Photo by  Allrecipes Magazine 02 of 205 Photo by  Kathy Deal 11/18/2024 This dish was so flavorful. I followed the suggestion of some of the posters and roasted the vegetables first. I used half and half instead of heavy cream and will use coconut milk next time so my vegan daughter can enjoy it. 03 of 205 Photo by  Connie Lee 01/14/2024 Made this for the first time. Substituted cream for coconut milk and added extra curry powder, green bell pepper, and red bell pepper because I don’t eat rice and wanted more vegetables in it. 04 of 205 Photo by  bhoconnor 08/25/2021 05 of 205 Photo by  Yvette Hopkins 08/05/2021 06 of 205 Photo by  StinkySweet 07/21/2021 07 of 205 Photo by  GCrav 06/13/2021 This is the best vegetarian dish I have ever tasted! It is mmmm delicious! It gets 10 stars. ?? 08 of 205 Photo by  GCrav 06/13/2021 This is the best vegetarian dish I have ever tasted! It is mmmm delicious! It gets 10 stars. ?? 09 of 205 Photo by  Sarah Hipp 06/06/2021 10 of 205 Photo by  Naomi 05/04/2021 Very easy to make, simple ingredients, and my family loved it. Only change I made was using coconut milk instead of the cream 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Delightful Indian Coconut Vegetarian Curry in the Slow Cooker 97 Ratings Potato Curry 124 Ratings Sheet Pan Aloo Gobi 6 Ratings Pumpkin Curry with Lentils and Apples 65 Ratings Quick Vegetable Curry 17 Ratings Baingan Bharta (Eggplant Curry) 493 Ratings Navratan Korma 142 Ratings Pumpkin, Butter Bean, and Spinach Curry 13 Ratings Sambar - Spicy Indian Curry 2 Ratings Easy Vegetarian Kofta Curry 9 Ratings Chickpea Curry 647 Ratings Chickpea Curry with Carrots 1 Rating Channa Masala (Chickpea Curry) 74 Ratings Indian Dahl with Spinach 260 Ratings Vegan Potato and Butternut Squash Curry 2 Ratings Vegan Japanese Turnip Curry 1 Rating Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
